H0.text: Atom is produced when two or more elements combine in a chemical reaction.

H1.text: Compound is produced when two or more elements combine in a chemical reaction.

H2.text: Mixture is produced when two or more elements combine in a chemical reaction.

H3.text: Solution is produced when two or more elements combine in a chemical reaction.

A4.text: A compound can be converted, via chemical reaction, into compounds or substances each having fewer atoms.
